00011 #include <sstream>

00013 namespace reflection

00016 
00017         const char* get_type_name(ETypeTag tag)
00018         {
00019                 switch (tag) { 
00020                           case T_VOID:
00021                                   return "void";
00022                           case T_CHAR:
00023                                   return "char";
00024                           case T_UCHAR:
00025                                   return "unsigned char";
00026                           case T_SHORT:
00027                                   return "short";
00028                           case T_USHORT:
00029                                   return "unsigned short";
00030                           case T_BOOL:
00031                                   return "bool";
00032                           case T_INT:
00033                                   return "int";
00034                           case T_UINT:
00035                                   return "unsigned int";
00036                           case T_LONG:
00037                                   return "long";
00038                           case T_ULONG:
00039                                   return "unsigned long";
00040                           case T_LONGLONG:
00041                                   return "long long";
00042                           case T_ULONGLONG:
00043                                   return "unsigned long long";
00044                           case T_FLOAT:
00045                                   return "float";
00046                           case T_DOUBLE:
00047                                   return "double";
00048                           default:
00049                                   return "unknown";
00050                 }
00051         }
00052 
00054 
00055         template<class T>
00056         builtin_type<T>::builtin_type()
00057                 : type(detail::type_tag<T>::tag, ARCH_BUILTIN, sizeof(T))
00058         {
00059                 type::set_name(get_type_name(tag()));
00060         }
00061 
00063 
00064         builtin_type<void>::builtin_type()
00065                 : type(T_VOID, ARCH_BUILTIN, 0)
00066         {
00067                 type::set_name(get_type_name(tag()));
00068         }
00069 
00071 
00072         template<class T>
00073         size_t builtin_type<T>::_attribute_count() const
00074         {
00075                 return 1;
00076         }
00077 
00079 
00080         template<class T>
00081         const attribute* builtin_type<T>::_get_attribute(size_t i) const
00082         {
00083                 return &m_parse;
00084         }
